12. Viktyr Korimir, An Innocent Child, has been Killed Night 3


Spoiler: Modkilled Players
None, it better stay this way

The Rules:
1. You are not allowed quote any out of thread communication.
2. Mafia can only talk during the night phase and pre-game confirmations, and no member is to message each other pertaining to the game. (If you are caught doing so, you will be Modkilled).
3. Play to your win-condition, if you are caught not playing to your win-condition, you will be Mod-killed and will turn into a Neutral Survivor.
4. If you have an ability, you must either PM me a Target or a No Action PM, if you don’t send me a “No Action” you will be giving up an opportunity to use your ability for the night.
5. You must post every 72 hours, failure to do so will result in a prod. You may be given three grace prods but once you reach the fourth prod you will be replaced. Failure to respond to the prod within 24 hours will result in replacement.
6. Do not attempt to use any hidden coding, or small text tags, all text must be visible. If you are caught you will be issued a warning, if it happens again you will be mod-killed.
7. You must vote with the appropriate tags with either VOTE: Kdowns; Vote:Kdowns.
8. You don't have to unvote before you place another vote but it is much appreciated.
9. Once a simple majority of votes on a player has been reached a lynch will occur.
10. Day deadlines will be 3 weeks.
11.If the day deadline has been hit and a majority has not been reached, the player who has the most votes will be lynched. In case of a tie, the person who has hit it first will be lynched.
12. Night Phase will last 72 hours, in which you need to send me a PM if you have an ability.
13. You may vote to no lynch, and if half the player list agrees, you will not lynch anyone.
14. Once you are Killed you may not post at all in the game thread except for one BAH post, that contains no game related content.
15. Please Bold all requests for the Mod, so that it will be easier for me to see it.
16. If you encounter any problems with the game, please message me in private.
17. Prods will be issued every 72 hours, if I have missed someone that needs to be prodded please tell me.
18. If you are going to be missing for more than 48 hours please tell me ahead of time.


Sample Town PM:
Player XXX, you are a Vanillia Townie. You have no special abilities other than your vote. You are sided with the Town and will win when all threats to the town are eliminated and at least one member of the town is still alive.
Sending Out PM's now.
9 out our 13 confirms needed to Start the game.

Day 1 Starts Now.

Deadline is on April 3, 2012 at 6pm CDT.

g'night all, goin' to bed. CYA tomorrow.

The question asked if someone would be willing to do a 1-1 trade with scum either day 1 or day 2. Every single VT is going to say "absolutely, hell yes!" because, well, it is obviously a good trade. A cop, however, might not be willing to trade themselves 1 for 1 if they aren't outed yet and have the ability to get multiple investigates before being caught.

If the question was "as general town, are you on average willing to sacrifice yourself for a 1:1 trade on day 1 or 2?", then every single player on the site should say yes unless they're selfish players or stupid. Therefore the question couldn't really be used to gather significant data in any way other than role fishing.

That's not to say that there isn't play style reads someone can get from a player who might say no, but that information isn't going to be particularly helpful to town, whereas the role fishing information would be hugely helpful to scum.

Ergo, my vote is serious.

PEDIT:
Thez, your clarification of the question still doesn't seem to gather any helpful information for purposes other than role fishing. On average, if I'm blind to my role, of course I'm going to trade 1:1 with scum, because town has the power of numbers on our side.

Role cop is for PR hunting, role blocker is for PR stopping, Godfather is the strongest "normal" scum role and can really mess with town, but not to the extent that framer can.
